attributes.action: Close all Schools and Colleges and University in lockdown to Prevent the Spread
attributes.additional_details:
I strongly ask the government as I am a special education teacher in Kent.

In the pervious locked down I teach my students by Microsoft team's where we had a live teaching session and published set work for them to do and they upload it and I marked them and they keep on track.

If you could consider taking this to account this will help to save lives and reduce the spread of the disease
attributes.background:
I strongly believe that we should close all Schools and Colleges and University. 

Plan of action should be all education should be done Online For example Zoom or Microsoft teams season for temporary bases. 

And this will help reduce the spread of the disease on children and adults.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
